title: Got my account hacked, day before season ends...
body:
Someone hacked my account the day before the season ended. I have never given out my personal info or any passwords or usernames... It was HACKED. I kept it at Diamond 5 O LP making sure not to play within 28 days so I would keep diamond border locked in. I get word from a friend "why are you deranking on your other account into plat." I sign in and someone hacked my account and inted and left 7 games to derank me out of diamond into plat. There has to be something riot can do here like find out the ip address of the hacker so i can press charges, also used my credit card.
Why doesn't RIOT use 2 step verification, its literally as simple as finding the password to the account and the password to the email.... there is no phone verification. I now lost diamond rewards to lack of security features. Now I'm sitting here at 6am grinding to try to get back into diamond... And I will have to sit here for another 20 hrs to make sure its not hacked again before season ends... I changed passwords and everything as well.

replies.body:
If your account was *legitimately* hacked and this wasn't caused by something related to *account sharing*, write in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if there's anything we can do about this.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I wrote in a support ticket and they told me im responsible for anything that happens on my account. MY ACCOUNT INFO WAS NOT SHARED EVER. Someone legitimately hacked my account and left 4 games lvl 1 and inted 3 games and I'm afraid that I'm goiing to get banned for it and lose my season rewards... I was able to grind back into diamond after changing all my passwords on email and account.

According to [this announcement](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230496748), you would have had to already been banned when the season ended to lose your rewards. As far as I know, you wouldn't lose them, even if you were banned today.

Let me know if you have any other concerns.
Its happen to me too while I was playing league someone was hacking my email account and as soon as I logged it was gone
